verbs.description: summer vegetable soup this vegetable soup [V: is] loaded with garden goodness from zucchini and green beans to celery and potato but it the turmeric that gives it a tasty new twist it one of our favorite summer soups —edith ruth muldoon baldwin new york vegetable
